title: 279 - MFM Guest Host Picks #2: Elizabeth Taylor
description:
Throughout the months of June and July, Exactly Right family members will be guest hosting My Favorite Murder! Each week a guest host will pick their favorite stories from Karen and Georgia.

Today's episode is hosted by Elizabeth Taylor -- co-host of The True Beauty Brooklyn Podcast on Exactly Right -- covering the stories of the Tulsa Race Massacre (Episode 211) and the Murder of Angie Dodge (Episode 185).
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
